code: import React from'react';import{Link,NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Row,Button}from'reactstrap';import logo from'../../assets/images/IMG_20240317_201244.jpg';import'./header.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var nav__link=[{path:'/home',display:'Home'},{path:'/about',display:'About'},{path:'/tours',display:'Tours'}];var Header=function Header(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav__wrapper d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:""})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"menu d-flex align-items-center gap-5",children:nav__link.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:item.path,activeClassName:"active__link",exact:item.path==='/home',children:item.display})},index);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav__right d-flex align-items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav__btns d-flex align-items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn secondary__btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/login',children:"Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn primary__btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/register',children:"Register"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mobile__menu",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"ri-menu-line"})})})]})]})})});};export default Header;
